title: Amazon Essentials Men's Long-Sleeve Flannel Shirt (Available in Big & Tall)
description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.
BRUSHED COTTON FLANNEL: Cut from a 100% cotton twill flannel brushed for softness. This durable and versatile fabric is lightweight yet warm.
EVERYDAY SHIRTING: Wear with jeans or khakis, layered or on its own, this collared button-up flannel is a versatile workhorse for your wardrobe.
DETAILS: Straight collar, button up front placket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoned cuffs, and a single chest patch pocket.

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
